page.title: 09STH WINGFIELD LEISURE TIME
page.content: We sent a questionnaire to adults in our area about their leisure-time activities. We found that the most popular activity is gardening(18 men and 13 women) followed by walking(14 men and 13 women).A 'meal out' is next in popularity (7 men and 5 women) closely followed by swimming (3 men and 5women). Other activities were only mentioned by men. These are fishing, jogging, visiting pubs or clubs and playing cricket and judo.Women named fewer activities perhaps because(as their children say) they have less free time. Most people do not leave our survey area to enjoy these pursuits and the furthest distance travelled is 5 miles.
